properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v1 v5

authors.author: Katherine Lee Bates Samuel A. Ward

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
O beautiful for spacious skies,
For amber waves of grain,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
For purple mountains majesties
Above the fruited plain!

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
America! America!
God shed His grace on thee,

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
And crown thy good with brotherhood
From sea to shining sea!

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
O beautiful for pilgrim feet,
Whose stern, impassioned stress

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
A thoroughfare for freedom beat
Across the wilderness!

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
America! America!
God mend thine ev'ry flaw.

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines:
Confirm thy soul in self control,
Thy liberty in law!

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
O beautiful for heroes proved
In liberating strife,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Who more than self their country loved,
And mercy more than life!

verse.name: v3c
verse.lines:
America! America!
May God thy gold refine

verse.name: v3d
verse.lines:
Till all success be nobleness
And every gain divine!

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
O beautiful for patriot dream
That sees beyond the years

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Thine alabaster cities gleam,
Undimmed by human tears!

verse.name: v4c
verse.lines:
And crown thy good with brotherhood
From sea to shining sea.

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines: O beautiful for men of faith

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
Who founded this great land;
Proclaimed for us, "In God we trust,"

verse.name: v5c
verse.lines:
And held to God's strong hand.
America! America!

verse.name: v5d
verse.lines:
God shed His grace on thee
Till lives confess His righteousness
From sea to shining sea.
